Bezier Curves

Sep 14, 2014

I decided to look more into Bezier curves, and try generating some with a sequence of points. I figured I could make a nice looking sine wave by joining two Bezier curves, the first with control points directly above the start and end points, and the second with control points below. This makes a nice pattern of start/end points and control points: the start/end points are always on a horizonal line, equally spaced and the control points are on another horizonal line, directly above or below them. Like dots on a grid. Then I linearly interpolate the control points from this starting position, to the next one in the pattern for the x-position, and increase the first control pointâ€™s y-position to make it stretch.

Press space to pause if you want to get a better look!
